data.title: Flex-mix
data.description: Flex-mix has all needed functionality for building web application from scratch. It is my own solution for front-end development. It`s sass based boilerplate with grid system that based on flex technology. Sass structure is based on 7-1 architecture pattern(https://github.com/HugoGiraudel/sass-boilerplate). Responsive grid is based on Flexbox Grid(http://flexboxgrid.com/). Automation tools: Gulp. Other libraries: jQuery 2.2.3, Wow.js, modernizr.
data.responsibilities: Whole project creation. GitHub repository, documents, whole development
data.techs: JavaScript, HTML5, SASS, Flex, Gulp, NPM, Bower
